response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, as it represents a culmination of expertise and innovation. Given its quality and utility, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $130. I understand its value to you stands at $100, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement. Thank you for considering my proposal.", "product_price": 130}
